name: Superb Country Olivegrove Domaine
description:
DESCRIPTION
For a wedding in peace, taste the pleasure of the generous Provençal sun and the majesty of the surrounding green setting within the Domaine. This superb country house of character offers to welcome you and your loved ones, in the heart of 30 hectares of olive groves and woods to give rise to your happiness.
Recently renovated, the superb 16th century country house which welcomes you to the Domaine offers you all the comfort you need to organize your wedding celebrations.
The "Les Palmiers" room with a capacity of 80 people with dance floor, is available to welcome your guests during your meal. With its large bay windows, your loved ones will have the pleasure of enjoying a panoramic view. The room is equipped with all the necessary equipment for your evening: 80 chairs and 8 round tables. It has a heated floor for ideal comfort in all seasons.
You can organize your evening from cocktails to outdoor dancing if you wish. Be careful, however, to take the weather into account. A reception tent will be necessary for all receptions greater than 80 people in order to be protected in the event of bad weather. In this case, additional tables and chairs must also be rented.
Halfway between the Gorges du Verdon and the Mediterranean, with an exceptional view of the Massif des Maures which reaches Saint Tropez in the distance, this charming place invites you to receive your loved ones for an unforgettable reception and wedding banquet within the 30 hectares of park that surround the bastide. Wide possibilities for accommodation and activities can be found all around the estate within 5-10 minutes maximum.
There is a fixed price for the Domaine which is € 2,750 from May 1 to September 30 including table and chairs for 90 people. We also offer a wide choice of menus from €88 so please do ask for more information.
The Domaine invites you to welcome you and your guests during your events, whether private or professional. You can meet your loved ones during a wedding, anniversary or a vow renewal. Do not wait any longer to let yourself be won over by the beauty of this place of character.
Location: Cannes: 45 Min; Nice: 1h15; Saint-Tropez: 45 Min; Marseille: 1h45
